p: NLR was significantly different between CCECAI score categories ( P = 0.004). NLR was negatively correlated with total protein ( P = 0.022, r = −0.35), albumin ( P = 0.007, r = −0.41) and cholesterol ( P = 0.03, r = −0.33). No significant correlation between CRP and NLR was found. NLR was not different between histological grading and dogs with or without CD. Contrarily, NLR was higher in dogs with LD ( P = 0.004). The cut‐off value of NLR for the detection of LD was 3.96 (sensitivity 82.4% and specificity 58.3%).
